items.title: What exactly is TravelKang and how does it work?
items.description: TravelKang is a comprehensive travel service designed specifically for international travelers visiting China. We provide detailed PDF guides for payment setup (Alipay and WeChat Pay) and city travel guides, plus a 24/7 AI-powered chatbot that answers your travel questions instantly.

items.title: Do I need to speak Chinese to use TravelKang?
items.description: No! All our guides are available in multiple languages, and our AI chatbot supports multiple languages as well. You can get help in English, Chinese, and other languages.

items.title: What cities are covered in the travel guides?
items.description: Our city travel guides cover all major Chinese cities including Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou, Shenzhen, Chengdu, Xi'an, Hangzhou, Nanjing, Suzhou, and many more. We regularly add new cities based on traveler demand.

items.title: How do I access the guides after purchasing?
items.description: After purchasing, you'll receive instant access to download the PDF guides from your account dashboard. You can download them to your phone, tablet, or computer and access them offline anytime.

items.title: What can I ask the AI chatbot?
items.description: You can ask the AI chatbot anything about traveling in China - transportation, food recommendations, cultural etiquette, visa questions, weather, attractions, shopping, and more. It's like having a knowledgeable local guide available 24/7.

items.title: Can I cancel my chatbot subscription anytime?
items.description: Yes! The chatbot access is a monthly subscription that you can cancel anytime. There are no long-term commitments or cancellation fees. You'll continue to have access until the end of your current billing period.
